page.title: 04Elton School _ a description
page.content: Elton School is situated at the top of School Lane.It has 91 pupils who are split up into three classes.Class one which was built in 1740,handles children from 4 to 6 years.Class two, built in 1876 handles children from 7 to 8 years.There is a hall which was built at the same time as class 2. Class three which handles children from 9 to 11 was built in 1961.Next to the School is a playing field which contains a foot-ball pitch and a running track.The field is 76x45 metres.The school and playground is 48x40 metres.The field is fenced off all the way round, with a gate at the bottom.The library was built in 1982 and there is also a kitchen which cooks meals every day.
